channel.title: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I found this: http://www.aldi.co.uk/uk/html/offers/2827_12858.htm
is that good for the price?
Thanks
i need to hopefully upgrade in the future etc..

item.title: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Aldi in the Netherlands sells decent computers for decent prices. You’re better off building it yourself though.

Read full topic
item.source: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc

item.title: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Specs not bad, quality of parts wont be anything where near what you could build yourself for the price though.

Read full topic
item.source: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc

item.title: Pretty decent pc for the price? starter pc
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

[quote=“soul raever, post:5, topic:328184”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=424568.msg3118377#msg3118377 date=1265252831]

its cheap, its medion not aldi

He meant the store you.

The only thing I’ve ever known aldi for is food groceries…
[/quote]

actually some of the stuff they sell electronics wise is quite good and reasonably priced im not saying cheap

how ever james since its a prebuilt pc from a supermarket then yes it is quite cheap
there will be room to upgrade it in the future[/quote][quote=“Thug-life, post:6, topic:328184”]Regardless of where it is from, it is a decent price for decent specs.[/quote]
thanks for the mature posts guys.

Read full topic
